SerialisableScheme.puDescription: Decodes and parses the machine readable zone on a document.
Displays the range of images taken of the document by the reader.
Displays the MRZ panel along side data read from an ePassport.
Shows the ePassport panel with IR, UV and Visible images.
Decodes 1D and a variety of 2D barcodes.
Allows decoding of any OCR Toolkit plugins currently installed.
Decodes North American driving licences using their PDF417 barcode.
Demonstrates the range of features available on the 3M QS1000 Full Page Reader.
Receives data from a magnetic stripe card device.
Demonstrates features of the 3M CR5400 Double-Sided ID1 reader.
Demonstrates features of the 3M CR5400 Double-Sided ID1 reader with MSR cradle.

SerialisableScheme.puName: CR5400 with MSR and RF Cradle
SerialisableScheme.puDescription: Demonstrates features of the 3M CR5400 Double-Sided ID1 reader with MSR and RF cradle.
